title: Putin Will Get a 'Win' Friday: Harman on Trump Meeting
description: Jane Harman, former US Democratic Representative of California, shares her thoughts on what to expect Friday as President Trump and President Putin are expected to meet and discuss the war in Ukraine. Jane talks about this meeting being a win for only Putin and that Trump needs to speak with Ukraine prior to Friday. She speaks with Joe Mathieu on the late edition of Bloomberg's "Balance of Power." (Source: Bloomberg)

shortSummary: Harman criticizes the United States' handling of Vladimir Putin, arguing it risks turning into a "win-for-Ukraine" situation without agreement.
argos_summary: The article discusses the upcoming summit between President Trump and Vladimir Putin, highlighting concerns about Putin's trustworthiness and the implications for Ukraine. It emphasizes that Putin has violated agreements with Ukraine and suggests that any negotiations should prioritize Ukraine's interests. The piece critiques the lack of European involvement in the talks and warns that without proper safeguards, any agreement may allow Putin to continue his aggressive actions.
